docs.title: Welcome to Loop and Learn Newsletter
docs.text:
Published on 17 September 2023.

In this issue:

  • Upcoming Open Zoom Sessions
  • Questions and Answers from the Facebook Group
  • Enhancements to Profiles Customization
  • Loop Follow for iAPS
  • iOS 17

docs.title: Upcoming Zoom Sessions
docs.text:
• Loop Open Zoom Sessions
    • 21 September 2023, 18:00 UTC: Topic Open
    • 25 September 2023, to be announced: Topic iAPS

docs.title: Loop Caregiver Video Replay
docs.text: • Video Replay

docs.title: Questions and Answers from the Facebook Group
docs.text:
• Can there be more than one settings profile in Loop?

    • Facebook Post

  • When I eat carbs for a low, should those carbs be entered into Loop?

    • Facebook Post

docs.title: New Features
docs.text:
Our Profile feature, crafted to swiftly save and transition between therapy setting subsets tailored to your needs, has received a significant upgrade. Thanks to your invaluable feedback, here's what's new:

  • Active Profile Indicator: Quickly identify your current profile with a clear checkmark.
  • Manual Profile Sorting: Organize your profiles exactly how you want them.
  • Profile Update Alert: Made changes to your therapy settings? Loop will now suggest updating your profile. Alternatively, save these new settings as a separate profile.
  • Profile Renaming: Regret the initial name? Now you can change to a new one.

docs.title: How to Upgrade
docs.text: This customization is compatible with both released (main branch) and development (dev branch).

docs.title: Browser Build
docs.text: If you've already incorporated the Profiles customization, simply rebuild to access the latest version.

docs.title: Mac-Xcode Build
docs.text: Execute the Build-Select Script, choose "Customization Select", and an update option will be presented.

docs.title: Loop Follow for iAPS
docs.text:
We're excited to share that the official Loop Follow app has now been upgraded to support users using iAPS (formerly known as FreeAPS X). A hearty acknowledgment goes to Auggie Fisher, whose pioneering work in a separate fork made this integration feasible.

For our iAPS followers, some of the features were not previously available in the FAX fork, but are now at your disposal:

  • Browser build capability
  • Auto-signing
  • Automatic workspace selection
  • And other LoopFollow enhancements

As always, we thrive on feedback and collaboration. Test the waters with the revamped Loop Follow and let the iAPS community know your take!

docs.title: iOS 17
docs.text: Last week, we recommended upgrading to iOS 16.6.1 and WatchOS 9.6.2 for important security updates. We also recommended waiting to update to iOS 17, as it’s still in beta and your Loop phone is a medical device. Beta is going well, but we are not changing these recommendations quite yet.

docs.title: Google Translate Links
docs.text:
Click on a language from the list below to turn on Google's automatic translation.

  • Every Loop and Learn Newsletter issue gets automatically translated to the selected language as do some of the hyperlinks from the pages.
  • The Google Translate Tool will appear at the top of each page
    • Google Translate Tool Instructions
    • Google Translate Help Link

Automatic Translation

These links connect this site to the Google Translation service.

  • No human has reviewed the translated information for accuracy
  • Please use the translation with care
  • Not available in all regions
  • Some links might not work as expected

docs.title: Google Translate Tool Instructions
docs.text:
Once Google Translate has been turned on, clicking on a link above shows a "Google Translate: Can't translate this page error".

  • To modify the language for a single page, use the Google Translate tool
  • To modify the language for the entire site, see Change Language

The graphic below shows the Google Translate Tool when maximized (default) for a browser and mobile display. The tool can be minimized by tapping on the up/down carets at the right of the tool. This is very useful if the tool obstructs part of the original screen. Additional options can be selected with the three-dot menu as shown in the graphic.

docs.title: Change Language
docs.text:
To modify the language choice for the whole site, copy the line below and paste it into the URL and then choose the desired language from the list

https://loopandlearn.github.io/Newsletter/translate

OR

Use the Google Translation three-dot menu and select Go to Original URL while on the Translation page.
